docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that now that the All-Star break is over, second half of MLB season is poised to feature customary races for first place in every division.

docs.snippet: Teams in the Hamptons Collegiate Baseball League work year round to line up summer hosts for their players, which is not easy in an area where rooms rent for hundreds of dollars a night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Teams in the Hamptons Collegiate Baseball League work year round to line up summer hosts for their players, which is not easy in an area where rooms rent for hundreds of dollars a night.
docs.abstract: Players in Hampton Collegiate Baseball League work year round to line up residents on Long Island who will host them free of charge; players can often be found at Hamptons summer camps, youth sporting events, churches and dance recitals trying to gain favor with residents; more established leagues pay their host families.

headline.seo: In Hamptons Baseball League, Housing Is Difficult to Find
headline.main: Amid All the Diamonds, a Bed Would Be Nice
headline.print_headline: Amid All the Diamonds, a Bed Would Be Nice

docs.snippet: Purchasing Time Warner would give Fox a robust roster of sports programming, allowing it to command more lucrative fees from cable and satellite companies....
docs.lead_paragraph: Purchasing Time Warner would give Fox a robust roster of sports programming, allowing it to command more lucrative fees from cable and satellite companies.
docs.abstract: Rupert Murdoch's $80 billion bid for Time Warner is seen as an attempt to shore up Fox's roster of sports programming, allowing it to challenge hegemony of Disney's ESPN; value of sports rights has soared since ESPN's founding 35 years ago, commanding ever higher fees from cable and satellite companies; successful acquisition would turn Fox into a sports programming behemoth in one fell swoop.

headline.main: Fox Challenges ESPN With Pursuit of Time Warner
headline.print_headline: Murdoch Challenges ESPN With Bid to Purchase Time Warner
